description:
Conan was nervous about getting his dick sucked, and when he learned that Hayden had broke his leg in car accident a couple days before this shoot, we BOTH were extra nervous about hurting him.
But Hayden isn't the kind of guy to let anything stop him from working. Seriously, the guy works really hard off the set too! He said all he needed to was just not bend it a certain way and he would be good to go. No pain killers, he was just gonna tough it out.
So if you are wondering why we are at the edge of the bed, it is because of Hayden's bum leg.
It didn't slow him down in Servicing Conan, in fact, I think he gave it extra effort! Conan watches the TV pretty closely, and his dick was sure responding to the oral and visual stimulation.
I think he drooped a little bit, so we switched over to some rimming action. Conan was surprised his dick woke back up, and in fact, he was harder than ever. After the shoot, he said he had learned something new about himself. I hope that means we can put other things in there besides a tongue!
After the rimming, it was pretty easy to make him nut, and Hayden once again shows no fear of cum. He has come so far!
Conan also was surprised he came too. He thought for certain he would have to rub one off onto Hayden, but I guess Hayden has developed the skills that worked like charm!
title: Conan & Hayden - Serviced
